thread.title: Roy Hodgson emerges as favourite for Leicester job after 'holding secret talks with Foxes board'
thread.title_full: Roy Hodgson emerges as favourite for Leicester job after 'holding secret talks with Foxes board'

author: Liam Prenderville
title: Roy Hodgson emerges as favourite for Leicester job after 'holding secret talks with Foxes board'
text:
Sport Roy Hodgson emerges as favourite for Leicester job after 'holding secret talks with Foxes board' The former England boss is in the frame to replace Claudio Ranieri and has reportedly already met with the board Share Hodgson quit as England boss in the summer (Photo: Michael Regan - The FA) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Roy Hodgson has emerged as the favourite to take the Leicester job. 
Claudio Ranieri was sensationally axed last week, just nine months after guiding the club to the Premier League title. 
Craig Shakespeare has taken caretaker charge and guided Leicester to a huge win over Liverpool on Monday night. 
But former England boss Hodgson is now in the frame to take over at the King Power. 
And the 69-year-old has even held talks with the Premier League champions over a return to management , reports the Mail. Leicester fans show their support to former boss Ranieri (Photo: Getty) Ranieri after winning the title last term (Photo: REUTERS) 
It is suggested Hodgson, who left his post with England after Euro 2016, spoke to club officials on Friday in London. 
However, he is not thought to be completely sold on taking over. 
Leicester's owners are keen to bring in another experienced name to guide the Foxes away from the danger zone. Hodgson shows his dejection at Euro 2016 (Photo: Andy Stenning/Daily Mirror) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
